title: Dalal Street
desc: A virtual stock exchange game where your aim is to maximise your profit. The game is active every year for 7 days leading up to Pragyan. The project uses a Golang backend, protobufs for communication and a React frontend.

title: Code Character
desc: Code Character is an AI simulation game modeled off of the highly successful Age of Empires. The only quirk is that your players are controlled using (hopefully) highly efficient and strong C++ code! Code your way to victory!

title: Pragyan Premier League
desc: Pragyan Premier League is a Cricket Management Event, in which participants have to participate in an auction of players, and decide their playing strategy in a virtual Cricket tournament

title: Beer Factory
desc: Beer Factory is a strategy based resource management online game. The participant owns a beer factory with the aim of maximising profit and gaining popularity among the retailers by managing his resources efficiently. The participantâ€™s factory will compete against a computer-simulated opponent factory. The money made and the popularity among the retailers, decide the winner.
